categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Kanika T'dell was a Human female who in 5000 BBY served as a bridge cadet aboard the Sith starship Omen during the Great Hyperspace War. That year, the Omen was knocked off course during hyperspace jump after a Jedi attack, and crashed in a mountain range on the remote planet Kesh. T'dell survived the disaster, and eventually she and the other remaining Omen crewmembers found their way to civilization where they took over rule of the planet. In 4992 BBY, T'dell had a daughter, Ebya, with another Human survivor, a miner named Nafjan T'dell. The T'dell parents were acquainted with Seelah Korsin, a prominent member of the Kesh Sith society who, in 4985 BBY, examined Ebya to determine whether she would be allowed to reproduce.
Kanika T'dell received her first and only mention in the Star Wars canon in John Jackson Miller's 2010 eBook, Lost Tribe of the Sith: Paragon.
